architectural_notes: Game must work without internet connectivity
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Power-up icons set including speed boost, shield, and slow-motion with warm earth-tone styling (powerup-speed.dim_64x64.png)
- Power-up icons set including speed boost, shield, and slow-motion with warm earth-tone styling (powerup-shield.dim_64x64.png)
- Power-up icons set including speed boost, shield, and slow-motion with warm earth-tone styling (powerup-slowmo.dim_64x64.png)
- Level milestone badges or banners for levels 1, 5, and 10 with geometric shapes and warm colors (level-badge-1.dim_128x128.png)
- Level milestone badges or banners for levels 1, 5, and 10 with geometric shapes and warm colors (level-badge-5.dim_128x128.png)
- Level milestone badges or banners for levels 1, 5, and 10 with geometric shapes and warm colors (level-badge-10.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a game that works completely offline without requiring internet connectivity
Implement core gameplay mechanics with player movement and interaction
Design and implement a cohesive visual theme with warm earth tones (terracotta, amber, sage green) and clean geometric shapes for a modern, accessible game interface
Store high scores and game progress locally using browser storage
Add multiple difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard) that affect obstacle spawn rate and speed, accessible from the main menu
Implement a level progression system where players advance through stages with increasing challenge
Add power-ups that spawn randomly during gameplay (speed boost, shield, slow-motion) with visual indicators and temporary effects
Add sound effects for key game events (player movement, collision, score milestones, power-up collection) and background music with volume controls
Create distinct visual themes for different game levels with unique background gradients, obstacle colors, and environmental elements
